price: (24) And said, "Is it one human being[1582] among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.
arabic: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَبَشَرٗا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدٗا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّفِي ضَلَٰلٖ وَسُعُرٍ
